website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot Elph 160 is one of the least expensive compact cameras you can buy, but you're better off spending just a little bit more on a point-and-shoot.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera - More Durable Than The Competition
customer_reviews.text: I am a contractor and I buy about 20 camera's a year for my crew. We have found these camera's hold up under heavy and punishing use. Each crew takes about 50-100 pictures per day, every day. The camera's live in a dirty environment and even though they try to take care, the camera's get dropped, exposed to rain are generally pretty abused every day. We paid big money for "more durable" camera's like the Fujifilm FinePix XP90 but the money was wasted. The Elph 160 has done the best over time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Terry

customer_reviews.title: Not that Great
customer_reviews.text: It takes nice pictures.. I struggle to get it to focus and I end up missing / giving up on shots. Also, the fact that you cannot select a mode (e.g. Sunset) makes the camera not really worth the price. The thing that makes this a 2-star camera is the flimsy and hard to open battery / memory card door. It is going to break and break soon. Something that flimsy and cheaply constructed should not also be hard to open and close. There is no excuse for such a poor design feature (one that seems to be getting worse with every generation of the PowerShot). Canon should be ashamed of itself.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I got my eye on you...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used from an Amazon shop for $30 to do some on the go vlogging for a personal fitness youtube channel I am making and this thing didn't disappoint. I wanted something cheap in case I dropped it or some other calamity. Super easy to use and the picture quality is pretty good for 720p. I recommend if you're on a budget but you want something decent.
customer_reviews.author: Joel McDevitt

customer_reviews.title: Great - small but has great features.
customer_reviews.text: This is a small compact unit but great features. I wanted something that was essentially point and shoot. I like the removeable memory card to transfer pictures and the lithium battery to get away from disposable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: White Crow

customer_reviews.title: Poor at focusing. Poor battery life. Decent pictures when it works.
customer_reviews.text: The automatic focus has problems. It's indecisive and likes to zoom in and out of focus. The battery life is terrible. It drains the battery heavily even when it's turned off. I was much happier with a previous model that used fixed focus. It reliably took clear pictures. This one, well...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Hanlin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has terrible image quality. The pictures are the most blurry because it doesn't have an image stabilizer. Also, when you zoom in when taking a video, you can hear the lens moving. It felt like a toy because of how low quality the materials felt. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter during a lighting deal package. We just starting to use it after allowing the battery to fully charge so I cannot say how durable it is but with past Canon cameras I doubt there will be an issue. we found that the pictures a surprisingly very clear so long as you stay in the optical zoom range. The operation is simple enough for her as a new camera user that it took very little time to get going. It uses a regular "mini usb" cable for connection to the computer so we already had a cable in our home. I would buy this camera again
customer_reviews.author: formula

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in the quality of this camera. For it to produce decent looking photos conditions have to be perfect... ie full sunlight. Forget about using this indoors without blinding everyone with it's crappy flash. My 3 year old cell phone can take a better snap shot than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and travel size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little camera for a point and shoot. Simple for kids to use, quality is good for social media. Overall I do like this camera. Picture quality is not great when you have to prinLightweight and travel sizet out at 8x10.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Keep walking , dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad camera. Takes too long to capture an image and do not expect to be quick with pictures as this is super slow from picture to picture. It constantly takes blurred pictures.
customer_reviews.author: nj.firefighter

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little camera to keep in my purse and travel with when I don't want to lug around my Canon Rebel. I was kind of expecting more from Canon, Can't say I'm super impressed. But overall not a bad camera.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a good point and shoot camera for basic needs. There aren't a lot of controls on it, but it does take rather nice pictures. Recommended for simple photography situations that don't call for the need to adjust every last setting.
customer_reviews.author: FJK1138

customer_reviews.title: and they are very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parents for their anniversary. They wanted a slight upgrade to their previous Canon PowerShot. They wanted an improvement in the picture quality, but one that was still simple to use. This camera does this, and they are very happy with it! They admittedly haven't had an opportunity to use it a lot, but of the pictures they have taken, they are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift quite some time ago. I use it for eBay pictures. Works fine
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W

customer_reviews.title: and this does not do as good a job
customer_reviews.text: I honestly expected more from such a high-pixel camera, even at this pricepoint. I bought this as a replacement for a previous model ELPH that I had misplaced, and this does not do as good a job. I have gone back to a larger 16x-zoom Canon digital with only 6 megapixels. It does a much better job.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for my mother. It came packaged in the official Canon box, everything was sealed. It takes wonderful pictures, and it sure can withstand a beating. If you're looking for a beginners camera, but you want a high quality camera, or you just want a basic point and shoot that takes lovely pictures, look no further. This camera is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The auto feature selects the best settings for a particular photo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother (69 years old) because of its auto feature. The auto feature selects the best settings for a particular photo, and when experimenting, the auto feature seemed great! Perfect for mom!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lillich

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves her camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my 75 year old mother. I also have a Canon camera and she borrowed my camera from time to time so she is familiar with some of the cameras functions. She said that with my camera she didn't have to focus as much, but she enjoys taking pictures and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzy Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Powershot....work Great....TK-U.....
customer_reviews.text: Can't seem to go wrong with these Canon Powershots. Had lost my older one of 5 years when it slipped out of my hand while back-packing. This is my replacement....Love It. Thank You Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R.

customer_reviews.title: I have not used it much but the photos look ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it much but the photos look clear. It is so close to my old one that I did not have to learn to use it. Looking forward to many pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stubblefield

customer_reviews.title: I expected more..
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, video isn't as great as they made it out to be. It's grainy and sun reflect off it quite a bit to give the video steams of light in it. I am disappointed from all the reviews saying it was great. But it reflexes the price I guess. I am going with the go 4.
customer_reviews.author: Leyba7

customer_reviews.title: quicker shooter
customer_reviews.text: had a camera that you had to push to many buttons to get to film -- this one will take shots or film without dinking around
customer_reviews.author: Tracey D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice small camera
customer_reviews.text: I love the Cannon Powershot Cameras. I have had several.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy L. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect! For the price, you definitely can't be beat at the quality of pictures you can take with this thing. I have used it nonstop since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Rivest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great. I am using it for a book digitizing project.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio RiveraTop Contributor: Raspberry Pi

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera. For the price it's great
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera. For the price it's great. Not the absolute best pictures all the time, but for the price, you can't be too picky. Nice and small and I like that. Excellent zoom. Good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Big chungus

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 9 year old to use on ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old to use on vacation. Worked very well and was durable. Got some really interesting pictures of random things, but that's not the camera's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: Delighted !
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great product for me. I carry it with me at all times and am able to photograph beautiful early morning scenes when I get off work at cruelly early morning hours of 6 & 7:00 AM.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Within a week, the lens would only close half ...
customer_reviews.text: Within a week, the lens would only close half way. I nudged it closed with a toothpick, and it's working now. I'm not sure how long it will continue to work.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: She loves it and so do I it's easy to work and takes great pics
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 for myself and 1 for my Daughter. With your quick service I was able to give it to her for vacation. She loves it and so do I it's easy to work and takes great pics.
customer_reviews.author: lpitz

customer_reviews.title: I takes very clear sharp pictures and can do movies as well at a great price so how could you go wrong great value ...
customer_reviews.text: It is everything I was looking for at this time. I takes very clear sharp pictures and can do movies as well at a great price so how could you go wrong great value for your money. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Rod Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: For the price it took some pretty good pictures during an overseas trip. Easy to use point a shoot. Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.author: MeMe

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my great granddaughter for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my great granddaughter for Christmas. She's only 7 but this is so easy to use and just the right size for her. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The 160 is a cheap plastic version of the Powershot ELPH series
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned 3 different Canon Powershot Elph cameras. While the ELPH 160 looks similar, it is a cheaper plastic version of the older higher end Elphs. Photo quality of the 160 is consistently poor.
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed I can't return it
customer_reviews.text: The camera is not focusing after only having it for two months. I don't use it all the time, maybe just three or four times in the last two months. Very disappointed I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Birthday mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact camera.
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera for my work. Compact. Takes good photos. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: jam5316

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far. Everything came that was supposed to and it takes a decent picture for someone who just wants to capture a few memories.

customer_reviews.title: liked my former Canon Elph 160
customer_reviews.text: After a long time still trying to get used to it...it keeps changing things...liked my former Canon Elph 160.

customer_reviews.title: So far it is working fine. It is more complicated than previous camera but ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working fine. It is more complicated than previous camera but it still working fine.

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing camera, it's really good for making video's
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing camera, it's really good for making video's, it was delivered on time, and was in excellent condition when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice point and shoot. Product was as advertised. Shipping and delivery were on time.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera. Compact and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: used it on our recent trip to Ireland work as expected - light weight and easy to use

customer_reviews.title: ... on our cruise vacation to Bermuda and I really liked it. The picture quality a great for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera on our cruise vacation to Bermuda and I really liked it. The picture quality a great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Reene

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a little more quality food on the camera (comes out grainy with no flash indoors even when well lit). But for the price this is a good camera.

customer_reviews.title: Just a body. Comes with No Battery or Charger if you buy used
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used camera. The camera looks brand new but it did not come with a battery. The description said it did.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the "everything that fits in the purse" mommy!!
customer_reviews.author: Arindama

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my parents. Perfect size and has really great quality. The flash works really well and is very easy to carry around. Great color and large screen. This camera is very simple and easy to use. However, this camera does not come with a memory cord or a USB cable adaptor to transfer pictures to the computer. Although you can buy that stuff at any store, so not that big of an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use it in a trip to Smoky mountains. I like it alot. The pictures we take it by this camera are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Anmar Salih

customer_reviews.title: Good reliable all around camera.
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these and when I broke it (my bad) I was happy enough with it I got a used model to replace it. Would get one again. My only real knock is that it does not have a viewfinder, which is common nowadays.

customer_reviews.title: Good picturea
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with a powershot. Both kids have 1 each and works great
customer_reviews.author: Olumide A.

customer_reviews.title: They loved the camera and the pictures came out great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters' trip to Europe with their grandparents. They loved the camera and the pictures came out great.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this. She keeps taking pictures of ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this. She keeps taking pictures of everything.

customer_reviews.title: Like the camera but it didn't come with an SD ...
customer_reviews.text: Received very quickly. Like the camera but it didn't come with an SD card which is another $15 so you can't use it right away. Wanted to take pictures Christmas day and missed all those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: over all an ok camera for the price, dust still gets in the lens
customer_reviews.author: J. Glines

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Uses the same battery as my previous Canon. It is compact, makes great photos and fits my lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Jane-Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: It is a great camera and takes exceptional photos. Light and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Elisheva Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera. Everyone should have one!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter who makes the most wonderful food creations. I wanted her to be able to take photos to publish these to her blog. The camera is so easy to use, especially for the beginner. I have a Cannon One-Shot (older model about 8 years old ) and love it still. That is why I purchased a Cannon for my daughter. The cameras are easy to use and continue to produce great digital pictures for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D. Anderson, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: they like it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad and mom who are in their 70's, they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Airw6554

customer_reviews.title: This ia great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to upgrade my camera for years and finally had a chance. The UI is pretty simple to use and the focus is amazing for a small camera. The overall physical design is really nice. The red definitely was a good choice for me. It wasn't too bright and not too dark. Although beware that the material is fairly easy to scratch. The button is pretty sensitive making it easy to take picture. The 720p videos are great and they come out exactly how I wanted it. Overall I really like this camera. The picture quality is amazing and it is very portable and light! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: FieryXeph

customer_reviews.title: Great little pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little pocket camera...a real workhorse, actually. Have blown thru 3 of them...but I shoot a ton of on the fly photos...Image quality is excellent...Would buy another one if this model is still around when I need a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe newer version better?
customer_reviews.text: Takes poor quality pictures primarily due to autofocus especially poor in low light.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wow, it is smallest camera to fit my pant pocket.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: More camera for the money! Excellent camera at a great price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son is making movies with this, he loves it.

customer_reviews.title: They came back with great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for friends to take on their honeymoon

customer_reviews.title: the recipient is well pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Camera was purchased as a gift, the recipient is well pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Charles Herrell

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Powerful Cannon Powershot
customer_reviews.text: My camera takes amazing pictures, the night photos are the roughest though. I would definitely use this vendor and this camera if anything should ever happen to this camera again. I got a definite bargain compared to other places. Most people think that my pictures are from some super fancy over-sized camera and are surprised once they see what I am working with. The video recording isn't the best under normal circumstances. You will have to play around quite a bit with lighting and pairing colors so that you get a clear picture the sound is really good, not perfect but it's great for small projects.
customer_reviews.author: Mahina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our Disney trip and was exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Sh33n4

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are fine. I wish it had a self-timer.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pictures and love that a memory card came with!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Not a great camera for interior pictures
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this camera after less than 30 days. Exterior pictures were fine but unfortunately, most interior pictures were blurry. Flash was either off or Auto. There was no stay on option.
customer_reviews.author: Samson4856

customer_reviews.title: Photos in the dark weren't good at all
customer_reviews.text: Pictures were sharp for the most part. Photos in the dark weren't good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Replaced 10+ years old sony camera. Like the different features and ability to upload to my pc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the camera is ideal, nice and light weight and thin. However, the battery does not hold the charge. I bought an extra battery and keep it charged so that I don't have to carry the charger with me all the time. I always have the newly charged battery in the camera. After taking six photos, with or without the flash, the battery needs to be recharged. I am sending the camera back.
customer_reviews.author: day tripper

customer_reviews.title: Despite reading the reviews, I still decided to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite reading the reviews, I still decided to purchase this product. I spent a lot of time reading the online manuals and trying to figure out why the pictures didn't look right, but finally gave up and returned it. Pictures outside in the sun never came out, other photos were blurry. Not worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Light and small with long lasting battery. Perfect to take everywhere. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good enough !
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. I often use video . I can video my daughter on the ice skate rink from far distance with zoom function. Video is actually very good enough. This camera is not good to take a fine photo under the dark even use with flash ... almost of potable camera is the same. I purchased a blue one for my daughter last year. I purchased same model form myself this year.
customer_reviews.author: felicity

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that a memory card was not included and that it was not mentioned more obviously in the product information :-(
customer_reviews.author: AZG

customer_reviews.title: Decent Camera - No USB Cable!
customer_reviews.text: This is decent camera for what it's worth. Very minimalistic. No bells or whistles here. Disappointed that it doesn't come with a cable to connect to your computer. You have to buy your own Mini-B USB cable.
customer_reviews.author: Tech B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement For My Older PowerShot
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to take pictures of smaller items. The settings it came with were a bit confusing, in that they weren't included so I had to go online to figure them out. One thing I would really like is for the Manual to not only be online so you could use it away from the camera.
customer_reviews.author: BlueHoney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. But it was advetised with a supplied card, which was not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Auto-focus doesn't turn off
customer_reviews.text: This camera sucks. I may have just gotten a bad camera. I'm a photographer, I know how to work a camera, this stupid thing AF all the time, even when I turn it off, it still continues to autofocus. I bought it for my daughter as a starter camera and now I have to go find another one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this camera for my Etsy shop to take better pictures of the wreath
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my Etsy shop to take better pictures of the wreath. I was standing about ten feet away for the close up of the sign, just used zoom. I love the clarity and focus. It has made a great difference. I also have taken videos and they have come out great. If you want a great camera this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: TOJ

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Have had great results from all my other Canon cameras. I needed another camera for work just to shoot exterior of homes, which is super easy requiring no fancy whistles. Thought this would be perfect and it is awful. Has to be turned on and off EVERY SINGLE TIME I need to take a shot so it can refocus. So frustrating and time consuming. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelynn Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality was very good when I received the camera. Next time I used it, which was about 45 days later, the pictures were grainy and the camera did not focus well. User's manual was hard to understand. The graphics in the manual did not match the camera that I received even though the manual was for this model.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera and the right price point for your teen
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for the kids for Christmas, we placed the order on Thanksgiving Night. It came in a bundle with Amazon Basic Camera Bag and 16gb Extreme SanDIsk. They really like these and we load up some funny Christmas Selfies of me and the wife before we wrapped them up
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Moments captured at your fingertip.
customer_reviews.text: Great moments are captured at your fingertip, really. So easy to use. Love the zoom. The filming feature has its own button - captured fat floating snowflakes. So much fun. Will be using online app recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CatRNell

customer_reviews.title: Good basic camera for those just looking for something to beat a phone camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap camera for sure. BUT it works. They intentially leave out features to get you to buy a higher model. Biggest Irritants: Have to remove the battery to charge. Only 720p

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to figure out how to use it. Instructions are not clear.

customer_reviews.text: This camera is TERRIBLE!!! It can not handle any kind of movement, and the focus keeps getting stuck. So many fuzzy pictures. Do not buy.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for me wife cus she likes to take pics of our baby.. The Pics were blurry and the lighting wasnt that Good. returned it and bought a nikon

customer_reviews.text: This camera worked only for less than 2 months. I WONDER IF IT WAS BRAND NEW OR REFURBISHED! Never buy again from this seller.

customer_reviews.title: Canon Point & Shoot
customer_reviews.text: Handy little point and shoot - I am always pleased with Canon

customer_reviews.title: This is a PERFECT starter camera for my autistic daughter- (got it as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a PERFECT starter camera for my autistic daughter- (got it as a b/d present) GREAT quality pics as well)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that amazing photography... Canon PowerShot ELPH 160 with free SD card ship faster one day! Thanks by AmazonLLC
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bilello

customer_reviews.title: Pick another camera
customer_reviews.text: a poor point and shoot, had the ELPH 110HS and it was SO MUCH BETTER. The ELPH 160 has less functions and poorer picture quality. Big disappointment .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, takes excellent photo's. Only complaint is that you have to remove the battery and stick it into a wall charger, much prefer the ones with the internal battery where you just plug the phone in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my Grandmother as a Christmas present. Looks good and works well. She isn't very tech savvy, so it was a perfect camera for her as it's not too complicated to use and has basic amount of buttons, nothing extra.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: I think it does its job , picture quality seems good. My only issue with it is its look. I got it as a gift for my mom and when we opened up the box I felt dissapointed . It's small and plastic and very cheap looking . Cameras that I have owned from years ago looked much much better . This one looks like a toy you get at a dollar store . Hope design improves or I won't be buying anything else in this price range from Canon ever again
customer_reviews.author: Myra N.

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 160 (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver| Style:BaseEasy to use and stylish too, the Canon Powers hot ELPH 160 camera is designed for hassle-free capture of family fun and special memories. Slim and light, it boasts a big 8x Optical Zoom so you can get close to your subjects quickly. Image quality is sharp and detailed thanks to the high-resolution 20.0 Megapixel sensor plus DIGIC 4+ Image Processor. When you're ready to shoot impressive 720p HD video, simply press the dedicated movie button, and when you shoot in Smart AUTO mode, the camera automatically chooses the proper camera settings by analyzing the scene based on several common and more unique predefined shooting situations, so achieving the best possible image quality can be effortless. Preserve your memories beautifully and simply with the Powers hot ELPH 160 camera.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

SLIM STYLE, POINT-AND-SHOOT EASE.
Easy to use and stylish too, the PowerShot ELPH 160 camera is designed for hassle-free capture of family fun and special memories. Slim and light, it boasts a big 8x Optical Zoom so you can get close to your subjects quickly. Image quality is sharp and detailed thanks to the high-resolution 20.0 Megapixel* sensor plus DIGIC 4+ Image Processor. When you're ready to shoot impressive 720p HD video, simply press the dedicated movie button. And when you shoot in Smart AUTO mode, the camera automatically chooses the proper camera settings by analyzing the scene based on several common and more unique predefined shooting situations, so achieving the best possible image quality can be effortless. There is even a Help button that provides clear explanations and guidance for camera operations. Preserve your memories beautifully – and simply – with the PowerShot ELPH 160 camera.

* Image processing may cause a decrease in the number of pixels.

SPECTACULAR LENS POWER FOR STUNNING IMAGES
8X OPTICAL ZOOM
The PowerShot ELPH 160 camera features an 8x Optical Zoom so more shots are within your reach. You'll love the flexibility that the wide 28–224mm (35mm equivalent) shooting range offers. Plus, the Wide-Angle lens captures expansive image in every shot, adding depth, perspective and grandeur. Landscapes, city scenes, family shots and more benefit from the extra width. Whether you're shooting wide group shots or zooming to the telephoto end, your images are assured to be bright and clear.

BEAUTIFUL IMAGES AND INCREDIBLE PERFORMANCE START HERE
20.0 MEGAPIXEL* SENSOR
With the PowerShot ELPH 160 camera's 20.0 Megapixels* of resolution, your images are rich and clear, with textures and tiny details faithfully reproduced even at the long end of the 8x Optical Zoom. This high level of resolution is ideal for creating the largest prints, and allows you the flexibility to blow up and crop any section of an image to express your creativity.

DIGIC 4+ IMAGE PROCESSOR
The PowerShot ELPH 160 camera's DIGIC 4+ Image Processor features accelerated processing speed to create fast, responsive performance, giving you a shooting experience that's easy and natural. The DIGIC 4+ Image Processor also enhances image quality in several ways. Processing of high ISO shots has been shortened by 60% compared to the DIGIC 4 Image Processor. This significantly reduces noise for brilliant color, smooth gradations, and beautiful detail even in low light. The processor's highly efficient design also extends battery life.

* Image processing may cause a decrease in the number of pixels.

GORGEOUS HD VIDEO FROM YOUR STILL CAMERA
720P HD VIDEO
Using the slim PowerShot ELPH 160 camera, you can shoot high definition video anytime, anywhere. With a simple push of the dedicated movie button, you'll be able to instantly record every moment in motion. 720p HD video is smooth, vivid, and beautifully lifelike, making it an ideal way to capture special moments with the family.

A SMARTER CAMERA MEANS BETTER PHOTOS AND VIDEOS
SMART AUTO
Getting that great shot is as simple as pressing the shutter button on the PowerShot ELPH 160 camera. Smart AUTO automatically detects scenes by assessing various factors in both the background and the subject and analyzes them using 32 predefined shooting situations. The camera then makes optimal settings to help ensure the best possible image capture, whether you're shooting stills or video. With Smart AUTO, all you have to do is frame your shot and capture away.

SCENE MODES
The PowerShot ELPH 160 camera provides shooting modes that easily give your shots a distinctly artistic feel without the need for any extra lenses and filters. You can make a quirky portrait using the Fisheye Effect or add a beautiful single-tone effect with Monochrome. Toy Camera Effect simulates a vintage look as if capturing the photo using a "toy" or pinhole camera.

SHOOTING MODES/SPECIAL SCENE MODES
Smart AUTO The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity. Program The camera automatically and intelligently selects the aperture/shutter speed combination based on the shooting conditions. Live View Control Enables Brightness, Color, and Tone adjustments to your images using easy-to-understand controls. Digital IS The camera digitally corrects image blur by analyzing the subject prior to choosing the best correction method. Portrait Brings the subject into focus while beautifully blurring the background. Face Self-timer The camera waits for a face to enter the frame before releasing the shutter. Low Light For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly lit situations. Fisheye Effect Now you can get the fisheye effect – a classic photographic distortion – without a fisheye lens. Miniature Effect Give images a miniature look with an effect that emphasizes perspective by blurring the top and bottom of the image. Toy Camera Effect Simulates photos taken with "toy" or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect. Monochrome Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue. Super Vivid Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors. Poster Effect Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts. Snow Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint. Fireworks Create brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks. Long Shutter Use to blur moving subjects for artistic effect, ideal for urban night photography. Movie Record video; unwanted scenes can be deleted in playback mode. Actual results may vary from examples shown above.
Final image may vary depending on picture composition.

YOUR ONE-STOP IMAGE MANAGEMENT SOLUTION
COMPATIBILITY WITH CANON CONNECT STATION CS100
The PowerShot ELPH 160 camera connects via a simple USB cable to Canon's brand new photo and video storage device: the Canon Connect Station CS100. The Connect Station CS100 makes it easy to store (with up to 1 TB of hard drive space with the capacity for approximately 150,000 photos or up to 70 hours of video content)*, manage and sort images and videos by albums, date or device name with simple menus. From there, images and videos can be viewed on an HDTV via HDMI cable, sent to compatible wireless printers, viewed/uploaded/downloaded smartphones and tablets or PCs, and shared with other Canon Connect Stations and social networking sites.

* Calculated with approx. 6.6MB for each photo and with average 32Mbps Full HD video.

A CHARGE THAT LASTS AS LONG AS A MEMORY
ECO MODE
The PowerShot ELPH 160 camera features ECO Mode to provide more shots per single charge through LCD monitor and camera power management. The mode can be activated via a dedicated button for easy power preservation when you are out for the day or the moment is too important to put the camera down. ECO Mode quickly wakes the camera from sleep when a button is pressed so you won't miss the moment.

HELP YOU WON'T NEED HELP TO FIND
HELP BUTTON
The PowerShot ELPH 160 camera is designed to be fun and easy to use, even for beginners. A Help Button on the camera's exterior brings up the help menu any time you need it, right on the LCD screen. From here, you can scroll through a variety of topics that answer your questions with clear explanations, offer helpful shooting advice, and show you diagrams highlighting the position of any buttons you'll need.
feature_bullets: 20.0 Megapixel sensor combined with the DIGIC 4+ Image Processor
Shoot 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper settings for the camera based on predefined shooting situations
ECO Mode helps reduce power consumption for longer battery life
